product_name: Jambu Mai Tai Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Easy-on elastic straps and a cushioned design make the women's leather Jambu Mai Tai Shoes perfect for whatever lies in store, from traipsing airport terminals to walking the dog. Memory foam footbed conforms to your feet for all-day comfort. Eco-friendly, partially recycled rubber outsoles provide good traction and durability. Heel and toe bumpers on the Jambu Mai Tai shoes protect your feet from rocks and scuffs. Closeout.
short_description: Easy-on elastic straps and a cushioned design make the women's leather Jambu Mai Tai Shoes perfect for whatever lies in store, from traipsing airport terminals to walking the dog.
